items.name: Lucas Migueles
items.role: Food Operations Director at Crep Nova
items.quote: We partnered with Tuki Studio on a design project to strengthen our brand's visual presence. We needed pieces that communicated clearly and attractively.\n\nWhat I value most about Tuki Studio is their organization and communication throughout the process, always attentive to understanding what we needed and suggesting improvements.

items.name: Ana García
items.role: Head of Marketing at Faros Salud
items.quote: Tuki Studio led the refresh of our identity so it matched our regional expansion. From the first workshop they aligned with our goals and turned them into visual assets that the whole team embraced.\n\nTheir mix of strategic thinking and design craft helped us launch on time without sacrificing quality.

items.name: Martín Ríos
items.quote: We brought Tuki Studio in to rethink how we present our portfolio to investors and partners. They created a narrative that feels true to who we are and gives our materials a professional polish.\n\nThey are proactive collaborators who anticipate obstacles and come prepared with options.
